text.name: info1
text.text: FB Alpha or FBA as it is commonly known is an emulator of arcade games,

text.name: info2
text.text: that is, it takes the program code, graphic data, ...

text.name: info3
text.text: from an orginal arcade game and emulate the hardware to make the game

text.name: info5
text.text: As far as the game is concerned it is running in it's original cabinet.

text.name: info6
text.text: FBA is an open-source project and it is programmed by a group of people

text.name: info8
text.text: Over the years this has comprised Jan_Klaassen,

text.name: info9
text.text: KEV, LoopMaster, Mike Haggar, Hyper Yagami, Ayeye.

text.name: info10
text.text: FBA is based on the original FinalBurn by Dave.
